snippet: In the worst fighting in the divided Syrian city in months, insurgents unleashed rockets and shells, and civilians came under fire from both sides.
abstract: Newly reorganized insurgents in Nusra Front and local factions carry out offensive on government-held areas of Aleppo, Syria; continuing conflict points to lack of progress in country's civil war.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and MAHER SAMAAN

lead_paragraph: In the worst fighting in the divided Syrian city in months, insurgents unleashed rockets and shells, and civilians came under fire from both sides.

headline.main: Aleppo Fighting Flares as Syria Insurgents Attack
headline.print_headline: Fighting Flares in Aleppo as Syrian Rebels Regroup
